mapper.select:
SELECT br.repaydate, byp.period, bes.deptname 'unitname', bed.empno, bed.empname, bes.extractmonth, bes.`code`, bpls.projectname, brd.repaymoney FROM budget_extractsum bes LEFT JOIN budget_year_period byp ON byp.id = bes.yearid LEFT JOIN budget_extractdetail bed ON bes.id = bed.extractsumid LEFT JOIN budget_repaymoney_new br ON bed.repaymoneyid = br.id LEFT JOIN budget_repaymoney_detail_new brd ON br.id = brd.repaymoneyid LEFT JOIN budget_lendmoney_new bl ON bl.id = brd.lendmoneyid AND bl.lendtype IN
#{lendType}
LEFT JOIN budget_projectlendsum_new bpls ON bl.projectlendsumid = bpls.id
br.repaymoney > 0
and ( bed.empno like concat('%',#{empNo},'%') or bed.empname like concat('%',#{empNo},'%') )
ORDER BY br.repaydate DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT be.id, be.`code`, be.`status`, byp.period, byp.id yearid, be.verifyorname, DATE_FORMAT( be.verifytime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) verifytime, be.deptname 'unitname', be.extractmonth, be.extractnum, DATE_FORMAT( be.createtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) createtime, be.createorname, be.remark FROM budget_extractsum be, budget_year_period byp, budget_unit _unit WHERE be.yearid = byp.id AND _unit.yearid = be.yearid AND CONCAT( '', _unit.id ) = be.deptid AND be.deleteflag = 0 ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT extractsumid, SUM( copeextract ) totalCopeextract, SUM( consotax ) totalConsotax FROM budget_extract_importdetail GROUP BY extractsumid ) b ON a.id = b.extractsumid
1=1
and a.status = #{params.status}
and a.code like concat('%',#{params.code},'%')
and a.unitname like concat('%',#{params.unitname},'%')
and a.yearid = #{params.yearid}
and a.extractmonth like concat(#{params.queryKey},'%')
order by a.status,a.createtime desc

SELECT bep.id id1, paydetail.empno, paydetail.empname, paydetail.extractmonth, paydetail.iscompanyemp isCompanyEmp, paydetail.idnumber idnumber, beou.billing_unit_name outUnitName, beou.billing_unit_id outUnitId, beou.pay_money outUnitPayMoney, bep.extractdetailids, bep.before_cal_fee beforeCalFee, bep.bunitid1 billingUnitId, bep.bunitname1 billingUnitname, bep.paymoney1 billingPaymoney, bep.bunitid2 avoidBillingUnitId, bep.bunitname2 avoidBillingNnitname, bep.paymoney2 avoidBillingPaymoney FROM budget_extractpayment bep LEFT JOIN budget_extractpaydetail paydetail ON paydetail.id = bep.budgetextractpaydetailid left join budget_extractpayment_outer_unit beou on beou.extract_payment_id = bep.id WHERE paydetail.extractmonth = #{params.extractmonth}
and ( paydetail.empno like concat('%',#{params.empno},'%') or paydetail.empname like concat('%',#{params.empno},'%') )

SELECT TRUNCATE(brd.repaymoney,2) repaymoney,IFNULL(bpls.projectname,'个人') projectname FROM budget_repaymoney_new br LEFT JOIN budget_repaymoney_detail_new brd ON br.id = brd.repaymoneyid LEFT JOIN budget_lendmoney_new bl ON bl.id = brd.lendmoneyid LEFT JOIN budget_projectlendsum_new bpls ON bpls.id = bl.projectlendsumid WHERE br.id = #{repaymoneyid}

SELECT bep.empno empNo, bep.empname empName, dept.DEPT_FULLNAME fullDeptName, bet.bankaccount bankAccount, bet.bankaccountbranchname bankName, bet.paymoney2 paymoney FROM budget_extractpaydetail bep LEFT JOIN budget_extractpayment bet ON bep.id = bet.budgetextractpaydetailid LEFT JOIN wb_person sus ON bep.empno = sus.PERSON_CODE LEFT JOIN wb_dept dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = sus.DEPT_ID WHERE bep.extractmonth = #{extractBatch} AND bet.bunitname2 like concat('%陈彩莲%') AND bet.paymoney2 > 0

select bei.business_type as businessType,bei.empno as employeeJobNum,bei.empname as employeeName,sum(bei.copeextract) as copeextract from budget_extractsum be left join budget_extract_importdetail bei on be.id = bei.extractsumid where be.extractmonth = #{extractMonth} and bei.business_type !=3 group by bei.empno,employeeName
